text: 23.2: Mt 17.27; Ru 20.25; Zo 19.12; FG 17.7Mbe zam ana kov Pairat han vugap, ana nzuav nzuav khaŋ nzuai, “Nza kha guma garim, ana nzan gumgi gu mbigir tɨvir tuara mbuim, mbe ana tɨvi zɨn vui. Ana vhɨra nza ŋkɨɨar Sisaran nɨɨnga tuav nza gori. Ana nza thɨvav, ana vhɨra khaŋ nzuai, ‘Gu mba Fhe Bakɨme taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav sarigi ŋgui gari guman pan ma.’ ”
